verbose_text: However, when we used siRNA to suppress PPARgamma expression, we found, especially at days 3 and 4, that C/EBPbeta expression was also markedly reduced (XREF_FIG, right panel), arguing that PPARgamma was able to regulate the expression of its upstream activator C/EBPbeta and suggesting that a second positive feedback links PPARgamma and C/EBPbeta.
